item.name: Abyss
item.comment: Outstanding graphics and excellent game. Played a lot during play test with Bruno. Very simple mechanisms with some little cards combo. And at least player intarraction (both during bid and when playing cards).

item.name: Age of Conan: The Strategy Board Game
Age of Empires III: The Age of Discovery
Cleopatra and the Society of Architects
Cyclades
item.comment:
I play with the proto and the final release of the game during the "Monde du Jeux" in Paris.
Really fast game (about one hour and a half), but very interesting to play for a (hardcore)gamer because there is a lot of choice to do...
A million of possibility to win :-p

item.name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple
Five Tribes
item.comment: I already played it dozens of times (as play tester). Very interesting mechanism of displacing meeples on the board to execute actions. Plenty of possible strategies which are driven by the "biding" system to determine player order for the turn. A lot of interaction is possible between players, when you lay the meeple you could open or close next move for opponents. A must have !

item.name: Five Tribes: The Artisans of Naqala
Funny Friends
item.comment: German. Adding reprint of the cards and protection with translation in french of all cards.

item.name: Les Géants de l'Île de Pâques
item.comment: The mechanisms are so smart : LOVE !

item.name: Gears of War: The Board Game
Jaipur
item.comment: Very good little game because my wife don't refuse to play it. :-p

item.name: Mr. Jack in New York
item.comment: I didn't play very often the first Mr Jack. But this one is really better for me because everything is changing in each party. The game is harder for the policeman.
